ThingDef.label: Reflex NSE
ThingDef.description: The Reflex Nervous System Enhancement (NSE) is a system of tiny networked nanomachines that embed themselves in the user's nervous system. These ones "jump" signals around the body giving the user to have extremely fast reflexes that allow for them to dodge near-hit attacks from time to time.

ThingDef.label: Comfort NSE
ThingDef.description: The Comfort Nervous System Enhancement (NSE) is a system of tiny networked nanomachines that embed themselves in the user's nervous system. These ones are able to filter out the micro-pain signals that cause the user to be uncomfortable and replacement with signals that make more comfortable, thereby regenerating the user's comfort.

ThingDef.label: Speed NSE
ThingDef.description: The Speed Nervous System Enhancement (NSE) is a system of tiny networked nanomachines that embed themselves in the user's nervous system. These ones coordinate the signals that cause the user's body to move and dispatch them with higher efficiency than normal, allowing the user to move faster.
